1. Fairphone 6 leaked renders implicate its modular design for easy repairs  Android Central
  2. Latest Fairphone 6 leak shows off the two-part back cover.  The Verge
  3. The Fairphone 6 leaks ahead of its rumored late June launch  Engadget
  4. The ultimate modular smartphone is also a decent mid-ranger  PhoneArena
  5. Fairphone 6: The Next Fair Smartphone Arrives Soon  Nokiamob

item.title: Nintendo's Strict Policy On MiG Carts Is Creating A Problem For Secondhand Switch 2 Buyers - Nintendo Life
item.description:
1. Nintendo's Strict Policy On MiG Carts Is Creating A Problem For Secondhand Switch 2 Buyers  Nintendo Life
  2. Nintendo is banning online services on Switch 2 systems that use the Mig cartridge  The Verge
  3. After just 12 days, Nintendo is already nuking Switch 2 console accounts for players caught using Mig Flash — popular cartridge allows Switch 1 games on the new console, but users say they're only using their own ROMs  Tom's Hardware
  4. Beware: That Pre-Owned Switch 2 You're Thinking About Buying Might Already Be Bricked  Kotaku
  5. Nintendo is making me question whether you actually own your Switch 2  TechRadar

item.title: Gigabyte’s slim, RTX-powered OLED laptop is $600 off right now - PCWorld
item.description:
1. Gigabyte’s slim, RTX-powered OLED laptop is $600 off right now  PCWorld
  2. Best Laptop Deal of the Day: $700 Off an HP Omen Max With an RTX 5080  PCMag
  3. This $648 MSI gaming laptop deal is outstanding, with an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060  PCGamesN
  4. Summer sale alert: the OMEN MAX 16-inch laptop offers fast performance and creative freedom  TechRadar
  5. HP to launch OMEN MAX Gaming laptop with Ryzen AI 9 HX 375  VideoCardz.com
